item.description:
We have approximately 7-9 players total and the buy in is only $10 withÂ  no re-buys as it is a week night. This is a friendly, game of Texas Hold'em. Repeats every 2nd & 4th Wed of each month.

Also will be collecting $1 for our new organizer Mitch.

Feel free to bring the beverage of your choice and we will have simple munchies.

Hope you can make it.

Darlene & Dave

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Poker Tournament-Texas Hold'em at the Rubinos House 2nd & 4th Wed of the month!
